channel.title: REST on Yougg's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in REST on Yougg's Blog

item.title: REST工具
item.description: package main import ( "crypto/tls" "encoding/json" "flag" "fmt" "io/ioutil" "log" "net" "net/http" "os" "time" ) type content struct { Title string Desc string Scheme string Host string Port int Request struct { IP string Url string Method string Cert struct { RootCAs []string Certificates []string } Header map[string]string Body string } Response struct { Status int Cert map[string]string Header map[string]string Body string } } type handler struct{} // tcpKeepAliveListener sets
